name: Night-Wind's Mystic Consideration
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  In ancient times, shamans, priests, or those known as mystics were always onthe hunt for methods by which they could communicate with the silentunderground realm. Ever since the Wayob gradually began to manifest, reactingto the resonance between the lone hero and the Nightsouls, this had been so.  Entrancement, disembodiment, and theurgy were the main methods they chose,each accomplished through the aid of meticulously polished ritual tools.
